ComicInfo.Penciller: Brian Ching,Clarence Lansang,David Finch,Randy Green,Brian Ching,Clarence Lansang,David Finch,Randy Green
ComicInfo.Summary: The war has ended. Voivodul has been defeated by Lucien. There seems to be hope for both Mineans and Dayaks to reforge a peaceful union as Lord Enoch apologizes to Petra for not having seen Voivodul and Grigorieff treachery. In the meantime, Marcus seems to be pushing the council to take a vote for electing a new leader, therefore cheating Petra out of her birtright.Andromeda, back in her own mind, is thriving to find herself, realizing how easily she had been seduced into doing another's will. In the citadel, Grigorieff, still devoted to Voivodul, is confronting Lord Enoch in a duel to the death. Only, the issue will not be the best for the blossoming new peace...
